property.name: youapp.mvc.pageable.service.factory
property.description: youappmvc pageable service factory provided by jquery data table

property.name: youapp.memcache.memory.instead.of.service
property.description: memcache instead of the memory cache service

property.name: databind.property.ext.handler.classes
property.description: any handler must implements {j.jave.kernal.jave.support.databind.proext.PropertyExtendHandler} split by comma
